user_query: My family and I are planning a road trip across the country. Can you suggest some healthy snacks and meals for our journey? Also, provide the nutritional analysis for a recipe using whole grains and vegetables as ingredients. Oh, and don't forget to calculate the carbon emissions from our car travel.

TaskList.description: Research and compile a list of healthy snacks and meals suitable for road trips.
Select a recipe that includes whole grains and vegetables and perform a nutritional analysis on it.
Calculate the carbon emissions based on the vehicle's fuel efficiency and the distance of the road trip.
